What are the Linux dependencies required to run Verus, and how do I install them on different Ubuntu versions?

To run Verus on Linux, you need to install the `libcurl4-openssl-dev` package on Ubuntu 16.04/Xenial and the `libcurl4` package on Ubuntu 18.04/Bionic+. You can install these packages using the following commands:
```
sudo apt install libcurl4-openssl-dev  # for Ubuntu 16.04/Xenial
sudo apt install libcurl4  # for Ubuntu 18.04/Bionic+
```

**Linux Dependencies**
Ubuntu 16.04/Xenial:
```
sudo apt install libcurl4-openssl-dev
```
Ubuntu 18.04/Bionic+
```
sudo apt install libcurl4
```This is experimental and unfinished software. Use at your own risk! No warranty for any kind of damage!
